questions.question: You are hiking along the MacRitchie Trail and spotted a macaque nibbling on something. What do you think macaques feed on? 🌿🍃🐒🚶🏽

options.explanation: Oops, kang kong sambal belachan stays on your dinner table! The macaques' natural diet is widely varied, it includes insects, fruits, flowers, and even lizards, snakes and crabs. 🌼🍎🪲🦎🐒 🌳🚶🏽
Oops not quite! Macaques are leaf-ing the life and have a natural diet that is widely varied. They feed on insects, fruits, flowers, and even lizards, snakes and crabs. 🌼🍎🪲🦎🐒 🌳🚶🏽

options.text: Fruits, flowers, and even small insects.
options.explanation: Bingo! 🏆 The macaques' natural diet is widely varied, it includes insects, fruits, flowers, and even lizards, snakes and crabs. During fruiting season, you may see more macaques foraging near fruit trees. 🌼🍎🪲🦎🐒 🌳🚶🏽
